name: Talos

features.name: Talos Downport
features.description: Flat pad, fuel depot, cluster of prefab buildings. No repair facilities. No customs worth mentioning. Law 2 and nobody cares.
features.campaignNotes: Agent Thale encounter occurs in system, not necessarily at port.

features.name: Dustfall
features.culture: Frontier town. Miners, traders, outcasts. Nobody asks questions.
features.description: Main settlement. Sprawling, improvised architecture grown from prefab cores. Surface-level buildings connected by covered walkways. Thin atmosphere requires filter masks outside.
features.campaignNotes: Kelsa Vorn (info broker) operates here. Frontier atmosphere — Law 2, armed populace.

features.name: The Pits
features.description: Mining settlement in old underground workings. Tunnels extend deep into the bedrock. Harsh conditions but mineral extraction is Talos's only real industry.
features.campaignNotes: Underground setting if combat scene needed.

features.name: Spindle Station
features.description: Orbital fuel processing facility and transit point. Small, functional. Where Patch (recurring NPC) works. Pirate scouts occasionally refuel here.
features.campaignNotes: Patch has intel about Whisper's nemesis. Blood Profit scouts refuel here — potential encounter.

regions.name: Dust Plains
regions.description: Rocky desert with scattered ice deposits. Fine dust covers everything. Visibility can drop to meters during dust storms. Thin atmosphere carries the dust high.

regions.name: Southern Wastes
regions.description: Polar ice deposits. Too small and contaminated for efficient mining. Automated surveying equipment left by long-departed prospectors.

arrivalBriefing:
Talos is the kind of world you forget you visited. A dusty rock ball with a faded landing pad, a fuel depot, and a settlement that looks like it grew by accident. The very thin atmosphere is a pale smear above the horizon — not enough to breathe, barely enough to notice.

Dustfall sprawls beside the downport, a collection of prefab buildings and improvised structures. Armed people walk the covered walkways. Nobody looks up when a new ship lands.

gmQuickRef.population: 500K total. Frontier culture. Nobody asks questions.
gmQuickRef.hazards: Very thin atmosphere (filter required). Low gravity (0.28G). Cold. No emergency services.
gmQuickRef.firstImpressions: Dusty, worn, frontier. Armed populace. The corridor runs thin here.
